title: eternal sunshine

description.plain:
Track 5, ‘eternal sunshine’, which directly nods towards the film ‘Eternal Sunshine of The Spotless Mind’, with it being a clear allusion towards the movie and its premise, as it hones its narrative to be about Ariana and her Ex-husband, Dalton Gomez, desiring to wipe her mind as she would rather forget completely about the relationship than live through the pain of her divorce.

In addition to the direct movie reference, someone being your “eternal sunshine” can also imply something that you will forever, or eternally, grow from.

Now being haunted by her ex lover as stated by Elle Magazine, it juxtaposes the ordinary semantics of sunshine, highlighting the impossibility of forgetting with its pessimistic lyrics

Whilst being interviewed by Zach Sang for Amazon Music, Ariana stated that this song just ‘fell into place’ when conceiving this album, realising that the film in which this song is named after, and the overall identity of the album, intertwine with one another to form this cohesive narrative

embed_content: Read “eternal sunshine” by Ariana Grande on Genius
recording_location: Jungle Studios (New York, NY), MXM Studios (Stockholm, SE) and Decoy Studios (London, UK)

body.plain:
Track 5, ‘eternal sunshine’, which directly nods towards the film ‘Eternal Sunshine of The Spotless Mind’, with it being a clear allusion towards the movie and its premise, as it hones its narrative to be about Ariana and her Ex-husband, Dalton Gomez, desiring to wipe her mind as she would rather forget completely about the relationship than live through the pain of her divorce.

In addition to the direct movie reference, someone being your “eternal sunshine” can also imply something that you will forever, or eternally, grow from.

Now being haunted by her ex lover as stated by Elle Magazine, it juxtaposes the ordinary semantics of sunshine, highlighting the impossibility of forgetting with its pessimistic lyrics

Whilst being interviewed by Zach Sang for Amazon Music, Ariana stated that this song just ‘fell into place’ when conceiving this album, realising that the film in which this song is named after, and the overall identity of the album, intertwine with one another to form this cohesive narrative

116 ContributorsTranslationsעברית (Hebrew)ItalianoРусский (Russian)العربيةDeutschEspañolPolskiBahasa IndonesiaMagyarPortuguêsTürkçeČeskyeternal sunshine Lyrics
I

I don't care what people say
We both know I couldn't change you
I guess you could say the same
Can't rearrange truth
I've never seen someone lie like you do
So much, even you start to think it's true
Ooh
Get me out of this loop, yeah, yeah

So now we play our separate scenes
Now, now she's in my bed, mm-mm, layin' on your chest
Now I'm in my head, wonderin' how it ends

I'll be the first to say, "I'm sorry"
Now you got me feelin' sorry
I showed you all my demons, all my lies
Yet you played me like Atari
Now it's like I'm lookin' in the mirror
Hope you feel alright when you're in her
I found a good boy and he's on my side
You're just my eternal sunshine, sunshine

So I try to wipe my mind
Just so I feel less insane
Rather feel painless
I'd rather forget than know, know for sure
What we could've fought through behind this door, mm
So I close it and move, yeah, yeah

So now we play our separate scenes
Now, now he's in your bed, and layin' on my chest
Now I'm in my head, and wonderin' how it ends, ends, ends

I'll be the first to say, "I'm sorry"
Now you got me feelin' sorry
I showed you all my demons, all my lies
Yet you played me like Atari
Now it's like I'm lookin' in the mirror
Hope you feel alright when you're in her
I found a good boy and he's on my side
You're just my eternal sunshine, sunshine
Won't break, can't shake
This fate, rewrite
Deep breaths, tight chest
Life, death, rewind
